name: Muhammad Nofil Ansari
label: Data Analyst
summary: I Analyze and Visualize Data using Python liberaries to extract insights and make data-driven decisions. I am passionate about transforming raw data into meaningful information that can drive business success.

projects.title: Sea Level Predictor
projects.summary: Sea Level Predictor is a Python project that uses linear regression to predict sea level rise based on historical data. It visualizes the data and predictions using Matplotlib.

projects.title: Time Series Visualizer
projects.summary: Time Series Visualizer is a Python project that visualizes time series data using Matplotlib. It provides insights into trends and patterns in the data.

projects.title: Medical Data Visualizer
projects.summary: Medical Data Visualizer is a Python project that uses Seaborn to create visualizations for medical datasets. It includes categorical plots and heatmaps to analyze relationships between variables.

projects.title: Mean-Variance-Standard Deviation Analysis
projects.summary: Mean-Variance-Standard Deviation Analysis is a Python project that calculates and visualizes the mean, variance, and standard deviation of a dataset. It provides insights into the distribution and variability of the data.

projects.title: Demographic Data Analyzer
projects.summary: Demographic Data Analyzer is a Python project that analyzes demographic data using Pandas. It provides insights into various demographic factors and their relationships.

volunteer_experience.summary: I have completed the Data Analysis with Python certification from FreeCodeCamp, which involved analyzing and visualizing data using Python libraries such as Pandas, Matplotlib, and Seaborn.
I have completed the Python (Basic) certification from HackerRank, which involved solving various Python programming challenges and demonstrating proficiency in Python fundamentals.

interests.name: Financial Literacy
interests.summary: I love to do Fundamental Analysis of diverse asset classes such as Stocks, Commodities, and Cryptocurrencies. I am passionate about understanding the financial markets and making informed investment decisions.

images.caption: Learning fund allocation and spending habits

interests.name: Reading
interests.summary: I love to read Newspapers, books, and articles. My favourite genres include, Religion, Cybersecurity, and Financial Technologies. I enjoy exploring new ideas and gaining knowledge through reading.

images.caption: Reading books on Cybersecurity and Financial Technologies
